Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import requests

url = ''https://community.sap.com/api/2.0/search''
query = ""SELECT id,subject,view_href,post_time,author.login,labels.text\(*\) FROM messages WHERE conversation.style=''blog'' AND depth=0 ORDER BY post_time DESC LIMIT 3""

resp = requests.get\(url, params={''q'': query}, timeout=15\)
import json
data = resp.json\(\)
print\(json.dumps\(data, indent=2\)[:3000]\)
")

import requests, json

resp = requests.get\(url, params={''q'': query}, timeout=15\)
data = resp.json\(\)
print\(''Labels for 14325739:'', json.dumps\(data, indent=2\)[:2000]\)
")

Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import requests, json

# Try the direct REST endpoint for tags
resp = requests.get\(''https://community.sap.com/api/2.0/messages/14325739/tags'', timeout=15\)
print\(''Direct tags:'', json.dumps\(resp.json\(\), indent=2\)[:2000]\)
print\(\)

# Try custom_tags or managed_tags
resp2 = requests.get\(''https://community.sap.com/api/2.0/messages/14325739'', timeout=15\)
data = resp2.json\(\)
# Check all keys in the message object
print\(''Message keys:'', list\(data[''data''].keys\(\)\)\)
")

Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import requests, json

API_URL = ''https://community.sap.com/api/2.0/search''

# Try querying with various custom field names
for field in [''associated_products'', ''products'', ''managed_tags'', ''sap_tags'', ''custom_fields'']:
    query = f""SELECT id,{field} FROM messages WHERE id=''14323336''""
    resp = requests.get\(API_URL, params={''q'': query}, timeout=15\)
    data = resp.json\(\)
    if data.get\(''status''\) == ''success'':
        print\(f''{field}: SUCCESS -'', json.dumps\(data[''data''][''items''][0] if data[''data''][''items''] else {}, indent=2\)[:300]\)
    else:
        print\(f''{field}: {data.get\(""message"", ""error""\)}''\)
")

Bash("venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import requests, json

API_URL = ''https://community.sap.com/api/2.0/search''

# Try various relationship tables
for table in [''message_products'', ''product_associations'', ''product_messages'', ''message_product_associations'']:
    query = f""SELECT * FROM {table} LIMIT 1""
    resp = requests.get\(API_URL, params={''q'': query}, timeout=15\)
    data = resp.json\(\)
    print\(f''{table}: {data.get\(""status""\)} - {data.get\(""message"", """"\)[:60]}''\)

print\(\)

# Try product field on conversations/topics
query2 = ""SELECT id,subject,conversation FROM messages WHERE id=''14299842''""
resp2 = requests.get\(API_URL, params={''q'': query2}, timeout=15\)
data2 = resp2.json\(\)
print\(''conversation field:'', json.dumps\(data2, indent=2\)[:500]\)

# Try the conversation/topic endpoint for products
resp3 = requests.get\(''https://community.sap.com/api/2.0/conversations/14299842/products'', timeout=15\)
print\(\)
print\(''conversation products:'', resp3.status_code, resp3.text[:200]\)
")
